caption.p: Inhibitory effect of ethanol (a) and aqueous (b) extracts of Euphorbia cyparissias and oleanolic acid (c) on DrPLA 2-IB, SPLA 2-IB, and PPLA 2-IB phospholipase activities. The activities of these enzymes were measured using the pH-stat technique on olive oil emulsion at optimal conditions for enzyme activity. Values represent the mean Â± SD of triplicate measurements.
